resources.string: You cannot remove this last item

Hello, this is a classification application. You can use this application to identify cows, cats, dogs, spiders, sheep, chickens, horses, elephants, squirrels, and butterflies. In addition, the app can read out the pronunciation of animals.
Click + button, select a image, classify that and read out it
The label has changed, the confidence of previous label would not provide.
Please select an image from gallery
